name: LEANN (yichuan-w)
description: [项目级] [MLsys2026]: RAG on Everything with LEANN. Enjoy 97% storage savings while running a fast, accurate, and 100% private RAG application on your personal device.。来源: https://github.com/yichuan-w/LEANN

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
[MLsys2026]: RAG on Everything with LEANN. Enjoy 97% storage savings while running a fast, accurate, and 100% private RAG application on your personal device.

来源: https://github.com/yichuan-w/LEANN
语言: Python
Stars: 9996

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
--index-dir DIR              # Directory to store the index (default: current directory)
--query "YOUR QUESTION"      # Single query mode. Omit for interactive chat (type 'quit' to exit), and now you can play with your index interactively
--max-items N                # Limit data preprocessing (default: -1, process all data)
--force-rebuild              # Force rebuild index even if it exists

chat = LeannChat(INDEX_PATH, llm_config={"type": "hf", "model": "Qwen/Qwen3-0.6B"})
response = chat.ask("How much storage does LEANN save?", top_k=1)
```
